text:
In 2020, the municipality of Bari
adopted a new platform

called "virtual desk" to deal
with the COVID-19 pandemic.

This solution allowed us
to protect citizens and employees

by avoiding
the overcrowding in the offices.

It was completed very quickly,
despite the difficulty of the pandemic,

thanks to the collaboration
with AWS and Exprevia,

and exchange information
in real time with operators.

This has ensured the municipality
of Bari a number of advantages,

including the instant
procurement of technologies,

the secure processing
of the users' personal data,

as well as absolute reliability
of services that have always been,

despite the variations
in terms of use
